name: storemsav
description: Store MSAV is a child Storefront WordPress theme for creating an e-Commerce site. Store MSAV WordPress theme contains some additional features to simplify the addition of analytical systems, such as Google Analytics, Yandex Metrika, Facebook-pixel, Mail.ru counter and others.
keywords: wordpress, wordpress-theme, wordpress-child-theme, woocommerce, woocommerce-theme, ecommerce, e-commerce, storefront, php, scss, bourbon, storefront-theme, yandex-metrika, google-analytics, store-msav, sass, ecommerce-site, facebook-pixel
author: Andrey Mishchenko
